Title: Relates to electronic delivery of insurance notices
Summary: Allows for certain notices related to property/casualty insurance contracts under the workers' compensation law and the vehicle and traffic law to be delivered by electronic means.
LawCode: Amd ยง3458, Ins L; amd ยง313, V & T L; amd ยง54, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, the vehicle and traffic law and the workers' compensation law, in relation to electronic delivery of notices
